headline: 3 Beaten-Down Stocks That May Be Due for Big Comebacks in 2025
summary: The past year was a great one for the stock market as a whole, but there were plenty of companies that didn't do well in 2024.  Shares of Celsius Holdings (NASDAQ: CELH), DexCom (NASDAQ: DXCM), and Nike (NYSE: NKE) all fell by more than 30% during the year, as investors weren't thrilled with their results.  Energy drink company Celsius struggled last year as its growth rate nosedived.
